text: xo brrda phu sraththa xey! Cng hı brrda phu thi muxkhwa khxng phwk cea khrxbkhrxng læa brrda phu thi yang mi brrlu sasn phawa nı hmu phwk cea khx xnuyat phwk cea sam wela khux kxn wela la hmad facy ri læa wela phwk cea peluxng seuxpha nı wela klangwan læa hlangcak wela la hmad xi chaxˌ thang sam ni pen wela swntaw sahrab phwk cea hlangcak ni læw mi pen thi na tahni kæ phwk cea læa kæ phwk khea pheraa phwk khea wnweiyn rab chı bang khnnı hmu phwk cea chen nan hæ la xallxhˌ thrng chicæng xongkar thanghlay hı pen thi chad cæng kæ phwk cea læa xallxhˌ pen phuthrng rxbru phuthrng pricha yan
